message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but the price is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $80?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
I understand you need to make a profit Alice, but I'm on a tight budget. How about we settle at $87?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $90? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good deal
